node.dox:d:
@mainpage
An interface to the history service event view

interface.name: com.canonical.HistoryService.EventView
interface.dox:d: An interface to the history service EventView object.

method.name: NextPage
method.dox:d: Return the next page of results. If an empty list is returned, it means the end of results was reached.

method.name: TotalCount
method.dox:d: Return the total number of entries in the view.

method.name: IsValid
method.dox:d: Returns true if this view is still valid.

signal.name: Invalidated
signal.dox:d: Notifies that this view is no longer valid.
